A clothespin can be used to hold a bookmark in place while you are reading.
A clothespin can be used to hold a bandage in place while you are healing from a wound.
A clothespin can be used to hold a piece of paper in place while you are writing on it.
A clothespin can be used to hold a note in place while you are reading it.
A clothespin can be used to hold a book in place while you are reading it.
